name: Save the Frogs
description:
Save as many frogs as you can and beat your own score. You are able to control 4 frogs at same time. You can change the difficulty on the settings section.

Control

KEY  D   pressed  for top Left frog

KEY  C   pressed   for bottom Left frog

KEY  K   pressed    for top Right frog

KEY  M  pressed   for bottom Right frog 

Sometimes the browser game gets slow or weird. If so, I suggest you to download the compressed file for better experience.
